Annotation.note:
Generated automatically with Gb. I. Verschelde TITLE : A neural network modeled by an adaptive Lotka-Volterra system, n=4
REFERENCES :
Karin Gatermann: "Symbolic solution of polynomial equation systems with symmetry", Proceedings of ISSAC-90, pp 112-119, ACM New York, 1990.
V. W. Noonburg: "A neural network modeled by an adaptive Lotka-Volterra system", SIAM J. Appl. Math (1988).
SYMMETRY :
The coefficients have been chosen so that full permutation symmetry was obtained. The parameter c = 1.1.
